1: ni rjes brtags <mistake>min //rmi</mistake> lam bzhin du gzugs mthong <mistake>'gyur //rtag</mistake> tu gzugs de <mistake>sgom</mistake> par <mistake>bya// dngos</mistake> med gzugs la sgom pa <mistake>de//rnal</mistake> 'byor <mistake>ba</mistake> yi <mistake>bsgrom</mistake> pa <mistake>min//dngos</mistake> po <mistake>rngos</mistake> <mistake>medg</mistake> sems kyi <mistake>mim/</mistake>
2: stong par ma <mistake>grtags</mistake> mthong phyir <mistake>ro//ji</mistake> ltar phra phab me long <mistake>la//gzhon</mistake> nu mas mthong dngos med <mistake>skyes// de</mistake> bzhin 'das dang ma <mistake>mongs</mistake> <mistake>chos//mkha'</mistake> la <mistake>dge</mistake> nyid rnal 'byor <mistake>pas//'di</mistake> las dngos po dngos
3: <mistake>ced</mistake> <mistake>'gyur// dngos</mistake> po stong pa'i <mistake>ngon</mistake> mthong <mistake>phyir// dngos</mistake> po dngos <mistake>yed</mistake> don yod <mistake>pa//sgyu</mistake> ma rmi lam mig 'phrul <mistake>bzhin//med</mistake> pa'i chos can dag la <mistake>chos// skye</mistake> ba 'di ni rab tu <mistake>mthong//yid</mistake> bzhin nor <mistake>ltar</mistake> <mistake>ma+ka</mistake>
4: yas <mistake>pa'i //sems</mistake> can bsam pa yongs <mistake>rdzogs</mistake> <mistake>byed //pra</mistake> phab pa yi gzhon <mistake>nha</mistake> <mistake>mas// ma</mistake> mthong ba yi <mistake>skun</mistake> po <mistake>mthong// nyi</mistake> <mistake>cso</mistake> ba yi mig <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>gis//song</mistake> nas <mistake>srub</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>po</mistake> yis <mistake>mthong//gal</mistake> te yod pa'i
5: gzugs mthong <mistake>na//rang</mistake> gi gdong <mistake>ba</mistake> cis mi <mistake>mthong// gal</mistake> te med <mistake>pa'i</mistake> gzugs mthong <mistake>na//ri</mistake> <mistake>bongr</mistake> <mistake>ni</mistake> ji ltar <mistake>min//gzhan</mistake> gyi mig gis mi mthong <mistake>zhing//rang</mistake> gi mig gis mthong min <mistake>pa//skye</mistake> ba med pa
6: mthong ba <mistake>ni //gzhon</mistake> <mistake>nu ma</mistake> yi bu ji <mistake>bzhin//gzugs</mistake> <mistake>brnan</mistake> mthong <mistake>na de</mistake> nas <mistake>ni //bar</mistake> ma chad bar srog rtsol <mistake>bya//steng</mistake> 'og rtsa gsum po rnams <mistake>la//lus</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> sems ni 'gog pa <mistake>las //zla</mistake> nyi sgra gcan
7: bshang gci <mistake>dang//khu</mistake> ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams <mistake>su//chu</mistake> me stong pa sa rlung <mistake>dang//ye</mistake> shes khams rnams skyed rnams <mistake>la// gang</mistake> zhig zla nyi mun can <mistake>dang//bshang</mistake> gci <mistake>ku</mistake> ba 'bab ma <mistake>rnams/srog</mistake>
8: dang thur sel rim pa <mistake>yis//lus</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> sems kyi rtsa rnams so // zla ba thabs kyi sku yin <mistake>te// nyin</mistake> mor byed pa shes <mistake>raba</mistake> <mistake>gsung//shes</mistake> <mistake>ra</mistake> <mistake>la sku</mistake> ni bshang <mistake>ba'ici//gci</mistake> ba <mistake>'babg</mistake> ma gtso <mistake>bo'i</mistake> <mistake>gsun</mistake>
